official_title: To establish the Pecos National Historical Park in the State of New Mexico, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Pecos National Historical Park Act - Establishes the Pecos National Historical Park in New Mexico. Repeals a provision of Federal law establishing the Pecos National Monument and makes funds that were available for such Monument available for the Park. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To establish the Pecos National Historical Park in the State of New Mexico, and for other purposes.
